item.description:
Ever wanted to try your hand at rock climbing? Now's your chance...while it's still cold outside, let's head inside to try some rocking climbing at the Rhode Island Rock Gym.

Ok, so I've never tried it but it looks like fun...I mean, how can you possibly keep a straight face while your climbing up an indoor wall with plastic blocks for foot/hand-holds and swinging on a rope?!?! Depending on the number of RSVPs we receive, I'll try to get the place to set up a group rate, however, at this point it looks as though you should be prepared to spend $20-30 depending on which package you chose (with or without lesson, etc.)

Assuming everyone is able to keep down their breakfast/lunch after some time on the ropes, maybe we'll find a spot for a quick bite/drinks afterwards!

Hope to see you there!

DIRECTIONS HERE
item.name: Rock Grinding - Indoor Rock Climbing!
